author: wn.com
title: Jordan's charity takes wings in Shanghai (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) NBA legend Michael Jordan poses with children during the launch of a Jordan scholarship project in Shanghai yesterday, aimed at supporting Chinese students. It's the king of basketball's second visit
